name: James Hilderbrand
text: Well expedited service and great tasting food. Not very close to us; still enjoy product and reasonable prices.

name: Baker Media
text: The cashier was extremely friendly. The pizza was prepa red quickly. The cashuse brought the pizza to the car where we were waiting. Unfortunately, after we were on the road again, we realized she had brought the wrong pizza. It was hot and fresh. We didn't go back to exchange it.

name: Tiffany Thompson
text: Love it! Inexpensive, tastes good, always friendly!

name: L Huling
text: We have just recently started ordering from Little Caesars. The crust is raised, and soft, which we prefer. Our daughter likes Domino's crustiness better. There is a generous amount of cheese. The price is excellent. A little more attention …More

name: Zielo Alters
text: Was a great location. And very convenient. Although just called this location to place an order and was informed that they are closed due to relocation.

name: Keya Family Vlogs
text: Would have received 5-stars easily but because I *always* have to request napkins, is beyond me.  Since the employees fail time and time again to readily hand napkins with your order it only makes sense to leave the napkin holder on the …More

name: Colette Aulder
text: The  African American Male who is usually closing - light complexion- between 200-300lbs - 6ft makes the best pizza. The crust is buttery and you can tell his staff takes time to make the pizza!!!!!!

name: Amber Stanley
text: I REALLY  HATE coming here. Sometimes the pizzas hot sometimes it’s not. I hate getting the “hot and ready extra most best” and the cheese is dried up and cold. The box is only warm because they put it in the hot box. Seriously make fresh …More

name: David Thomas
text: This Little Caesars location is my favorite. They have a very friendly staff and they are always working their tails off. The food is always fresh and the employees are very kind to the customers. I enjoy every visit.

text: Disappointed that we arrived an hour before closing and we were told that we could not order specialty pizzas ... we could only purchase the "hot and ready" ones because they were closing in 58 minutes. To make matters more unpleasant, we …More
